DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect Protonics knee brace Hamstring Resisted Exercise ( HRE ) anterior pelvic tilt , hip internal rotation adduction , knee pain subject Patellofemoral pain symptom ( PFPS ) examine reliability validity self-report patellofemoral disability index ( PDI ) measure functional performance subject PFPS .
DOC.brief_title: Protonics Knee Brace Versus Hamstring Resisted Exercise ( HRE ) Individuals With Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose graduate student research study compare effect Protonics knee brace Hamstring Resisted Exercise ( HRE ) anterior pelvic tilt , hip internal rotation adduction , knee pain subject Patellofemoral pain symptom ( PFPS ) examine reliability validity self-report patellofemoral disability index ( PDI ) measure functional performance subject PFPS . There three visit 4 week 1 hour per visit , first visit take 2 hour . In visit one , participant ask sign inform consent , complete five questionnaire . Then , hip range motion ( ROM ) , pelvic tilt angle , lateral step-up test measure . Participants randomly assign one two group : group one receiving Protonics knee brace exercise , home program group two get hamstring-resisted exercise use sport cord home program . Participant group walk specific distance phase . Phase I ( walk 5 min straight surface ) , Phase II ( walk 8 min inclined surface ) , Phase III ( walk 10 min different direction ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects male female Patellofemoral pain symptom 1 month , pain level â‰¥ 3 Numeric Pain Rating Scale , pain least 2 activity , squat , ascending/descending stair , and/or run . Subjects exclude previous traumatic injury knee joint/lower limb , sign , symptom meniscus tear ligamentousrelated pathology , neurological disorder pain medication . ''
